structure.unit: ARTICLE CXIX. BUILDING BETTER COMMUNITIES CITIZENS' ADVISORY COMMITTEE

text.section:
Sec. 2-1801. Authority and purpose.
There is created and established pursuant to the Home Rule Amendment and Charter of Miami-Dade County, as amended, an advisory committee of Miami-Dade County to be known as the Building Better Communities Citizens' Advisory Committee ("Advisory Committee"). The Advisory Committee is established solely for the purpose of advising the Mayor, the Board of County Commissioners ("Commission") and the County Manager regarding the Building Better Communities General Obligation Bond Program ("Bond Program"). The Advisory Committee may exercise only those duties specifically granted in this Article or necessary in the exercise of the duties enumerated in this Article.
